alert.note: Alert for Steuben (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Steuben County through 700 PM EDT... At 615 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hartsville, or 9 miles south of Hornell, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Canisteo, Woodhull, Jasper, Troupsburg, Greenwood, Hartsville, Willeyville, Young Hickory and West Greenwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
